snippet: A study finds that withdrawals for nonretirement purposes by account holders under age 60 amount to $60 billion a year.
abstract: HelloWallet study finds that more than one out of four American households have dipped into their retirement accounts, often with significant negative consequences for their financial futures.
lead_paragraph: A study finds that withdrawals for nonretirement purposes by account holders under age 60 amount to $60 billion a year.

headline.seo: Early Withdrawals Plague Retirement Accounts, Study Says
